trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Kalamazoo
There were no other sightings in Kalamazoo on or around December 1st 2011
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
Summary: me and a buddy walked out of my barn and noticed a bright light that began to move oddly. shortly after, others appeared and dissapeared.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was running from inside my barn towards our house one night and noticed two extremely bright lights, i kept running, turned back and only saw one. the next night i had a friend over and we were out side and i told him about the lights from the previous night. we looked in the same area and there was one bright light, brighter than any star in the sky. it began to move up in the sky slowly, then down and to the left, then slowly back up and eventually disappeared. two more dim red lights moved up from the tree line and began to get brighter and then also disappeared. some slowly dimmed away slowly and others disappeared abruptly. sense then, they've been visible in the sky every night (that isn't cloudy) for about the last month.
